casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Smith, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Smith, 124 Ohio St.3d 116, 2009-Ohio-6539.]

(Nos. 2009-0076 and 2009-0578 Submitted September 30, 2009 Decided December 17, 2009.)

{¶ 1} The certified question is answered in the negative and the judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State v. Lester, 123 Ohio St.3d 396, 2009-Ohio-4225, 916 N.E.2d 1038.

Moyer, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, and Cupp, JJ., concur. *117Ronald A. Smith, pro se.
